content.rendered:
Check out our wonderful

Newsmag Gallery

We're always delighted to discover our themes behind beautiful websites. This is our way of thanking our customers!

Buy Newsmag

Discover websites

Ordes
"The theme connects with the user creativity!"
Ordes is an online portal that defines the vales and beliefs of many people united in an international association. Social projects, volunteering, and sustainable development are some of the interests.
Pedal Ogni Giorno
"The Newsmag theme is easy, full, dynamic, flexible."
Pedal Ogni Giorno is a personal blog driven by the passion for sustainability and cycling mobility. It provides quality advice and podcasts on all bicycle types, tours, and many more.
Georgina Post
"Newsmag is very easy to customize and comes with useful plugins."
Georgia Post is the online version of a local newspaper from Ontario, Canada. Using a clean layout, it publishes daily news, latest community & charity events, lifestyle, and environment articles.
Piracy Monitor
"Great theme, and the technical support is excellent and patient."
If you're looking out for a real source of information about digital piracy such as content, advertising, programming, the Piracy Monitor website is everything you need.
EaFeed
"The experience with Newsmag is amazing and satisfying."
If you’re looking for education news, how to’s, or interesting biographies across East Africa.
Travels Promo
“Great theme with a lot of customization. It makes my website beautiful and as fast as possible. Thank you, guys. Great Job!”
By navigating on the Indonesian Travels Promo blog you can read information on the best hotel offers, low-cost airline tickets, and other holiday promotions.
DubCNN
“Been using Newsmag since 2015. It’s a simple and easy to use experience and is always expanding functionality.”
DubCNN is a clean music-based website, with news, videos, and interviews with well-known artists from the West Coast of US.
ePodravina
“Found it easy and powerful to form the grid articles we wanted. Made a lot of tweaks and hacks to get all details in place.”
ePodravina is a news portal that captures all the events in the region of Podravina. It contains various informative, entertaining content.
Panorama
“Great features, great theme."
Panorama is an online news portal from Albania. Discover amazing articles on lifestyle, sport, chronicles, politics, economics, culture, and more. Panorama is also a well appreciated daily newspaper in Tirana.
aiPod Drifters
“Great theme! It looks nice and clean, and it loads fast out of the box. With a few tweaks, it can be blazing fast. Really well documented, all the aspects covered in depth! Love the tagDiv Composer, as it’s really easy to style as you prefer. Not forgetting the TD plugins that are a really nice bonus, especially the TD Speed Booster.”
aiPod Drifters performs as a great blog for drifting lovers. Destined for the “Assetto Corsa” racing video game, the site provides how-to videos, entertainment and car news.
My UK Visa
“I am really fond of your theme. Very easy to use and very customer oriented features.”
This is a Russian blog created to deliver the latest news and verified information on applying for a British Visa.
My Lefkada
“I am simply in love with your theme!”
My Lefkada is a “city” news website. Actually is all about the life on the beautiful Greece island Lefkada, providing travel, food, traditions and useful daily news.
Flavour Mag
“Amazing theme! Newsmag is perfect for my website. I had a few issues along the way, but its nothing that hasn't been sorted out via the forum.”
Flavour Mag is a lifestyle magazine website from England, that publishes the latest news from fashion, movies, music and new trends from the entertainment industry.
Anorthosis24
"It was very and fast to deploy the template. We are very happy with the overall experience with this template. Best coded theme in themeforest.net!"
An independent football fan website, Anorthosis24.net, provides its readers with information regarding the evolution of their favorite team.
Beautiful World
“We love the flexibility within the theme panel which combines a feature rich set of options with intuitive ease of use. The mega menu is simply wonderful, and the very high degree of responsiveness for mobile and tablet users ensures that all our visitors get an excellent browsing experience.”
The Beautiful World magazine is the place where the images of all the most amazing places of the word are gathered in a vivid and colored travel guide and blog.
SihirliElma
“I'm a newbie with Newsmag. Before that, I was working with another theme. I switched to Newsmag in April, and I'm extremely satisfied with it. I'm very happy with the change. I love your work! Keep up the good work! Thank you again.”
SihirliElma is a Turkish online platform dedicated to technology enthusiasts. This tech news blog is full of tips and tricks on using the Apple products.
Otoniaga
"The best magazine theme ever!"
Otoniaga website is a news magazine dedicated to commercial vehicles, bringing relevant and fresh news from the automotive industry.
VignaClaraBlog
"Good speed performance, a lot of customizing opportunities and good compatibility with Yoast SEO"
VignaClaraBlog.it is an Italian awarded magazine for the Rome North area, providing it’s readers with useful information about their city.
California Newswire
"A wonderful theme, easy to work with, robust, optimized and superb support. Does everything we need and it does it very well"
California Newswire is a unique online portal combing a wide variety of original content related to living in California.
Nord Amerika
"Left nothing to be desired, amazing, good updates, was worth buying!"
The NordAmerika website is a travel news portal dedicated to the German speaker tourists that want to travel to Canad or the United States.
12Page 1 of 2

Over 120,000+ Customers Are Already Building Awesome Websites

Join our enthusiastic community to get powerful tools to build your dream, and free lifetime updates. Did we mentioned that we have an awesome customer support?

Buy Now
